one_reviews_text: What's the point of this game? I stare at an hourglass at the bottom right for minutes with beautiful loop background music and nothing happens? Ok, I knew something must be wrong because it's free.
review_feedback:
Hello Jay_Joe,

It seems like you are experiencing technical issues - could you provide your specs so we can look into this further? Thank you in advance,

Sarah

one_reviews_text: Excellent art. Powerful story/content. Integration, engagement, and immersion, all excellent. Thank you for this. Top recommended for socially engaged VR work

....I got very emotional when you talked about your grandfather.  Mine was such an important part of my life growing up.  And yes, I got to fish AND play horse shoes with him too.  Precious memories.

Like you, I was an older kid before I learned of the internment camps here in the USA on the west coast where I grew up.  I was a teen in the late 1970s and even then, I simply couldn't believe we could do such a thing.  And if I am to bare my chest here - I had no idea until watching your VR story tonight, that this awful thing also occured in Canada.  I have watched and read terra bytes of history about these times and can't recall ever reading about the Canadian camps.

I know your grandpa would be very proud of you and what you have done here.  I hope your father gets to see it if he hasn't already.

As for the production quality itself - it's second to none - perfect in every way.  And thank you so much for not making it political and devisive.  

A standing ovation has been earned by you and your team.  My hat's off to all of you.
review_feedback: Dear Double_Shot, thank you so much for your detailed and kind review. We loved hearing that you also had such a strong bond with your grandfather. We truly believe it's an important story to be told, and we are glad that you agree. Many thanks!

one_reviews_text:
A very authentic and intimate narrative experience. Beautiful visuals, and runs pretty flawless on my 1070. I think this is a very important piece everyone should check out, and it's free! Can't go wrong. 
10/10
review_feedback: Thank you for your kind review!
Thank you so much for your thoughts, we're grateful you enjoyed the experience.

one_reviews_text: I can recommend it to anyone who wants to learn something new. =)
review_feedback: Thank you Kruxis for recommending the Book of Distance!
